Package main.java.com.jamobox.jamchatcore.server

Contains all classes that are directly related to the server connection.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Server
    A server is any node that we can connect to using the client.
    ServerReader
    Handles reading server input streams TODO: Create a cleaner way of getting the input.
    ServerWriter
    Handles writing to the server output stream.

Package main.java.com.jamobox.jamchatcore.server Description

Contains all classes that are directly related to the server connection. The Server class within this package must always be extended by any instance of a server that is implemented in a client. The package also contains classes of reading from and writing to the instance of the Server class.
